description: This is an HTML file that defines the structure and styling of a web-based database visualizer interface, including elements for database list, table display, and data rendering with interactive features. It contains embedded JavaScript to fetch and display database and table data dynamically.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases from the API and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list by reloading the databases from the backend.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Toggles the display of tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays the list of tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and renders data for a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Creates the HTML table to display data, including headers and rows.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Renders individual cell content, handling objects, long strings, and nulls.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Handles expanding or collapsing table cell contents for better readability.
